step_goal: Activate wall-mounted light switches to illuminate the room
rationale: Adequate room lighting is required to safely locate, identify, and handle kitchen items during subsequent meal preparation steps, as low visibility increases the risk of spills, breakage, or incorrect item selection.

causal_chain.action: rotate wall-mounted round switch knobs to activate electrical lighting

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The panel has intact round knobs designed for rotation, and no visible damage indicates it can transmit electrical current to lighting fixtures when activated.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: The knobs are rotated to close the electrical circuit, powering the lighting fixtures and brightening the room.
Increased illumination makes kitchen items like the refrigerator, cereal box, and mug visible and accessible for handling.

counterfactual_challenge_question: What if the light switch panel had a loose electrical connection to the lighting fixtures?
expected_challenge_outcome: The room would not fully illuminate, or the lights would flicker intermittently, because the loose connection would disrupt the continuous flow of electrical current needed to power the fixtures consistently.

failure_reflecting.reason: One switch knob does not fully rotate to the 'on' position, leaving a section of the room dimly lit.
failure_reflecting.recovery_strategy: Firmly re-rotate the faulty knob to ensure it engages the electrical circuit, or use the other operable switches to maximize available illumination for meal preparation.

critical_frames.action_state_change_description: Hand makes contact with the wall-mounted switch panel, initiating rotation of the round switch knobs to start the lighting activation process.

causal_chain.action: rotate wall-mounted round switch knobs to activate electrical lighting

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The panel has intact round knobs designed for rotation, and no visible damage indicates it can transmit electrical current to lighting fixtures when activated.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: The knobs are being rotated to close the electrical circuit, initiating power flow to the lighting fixtures.

hotspot.description: Round plastic switch knobs on the wall-mounted panel
hotspot.mechanism: Friction between fingers and the textured knob surface allows torque transfer to rotate the switch, initiating the electrical circuit closure.

critical_frames.action_state_change_description: The room is fully illuminated, and the hand has moved away from the switch panel, confirming the lighting activation process is complete.

causal_chain.action: rotate wall-mounted round switch knobs to activate electrical lighting

causal_precondition_on_affordance.reasons: The knobs have been rotated to close the electrical circuit, powering the lighting fixtures.

causal_effect_on_affordance.reasons: Full illumination makes kitchen items like the refrigerator, dining table, and storage areas visible and accessible for subsequent meal preparation steps.

hotspot.description: Wall-mounted switch panel with activated knobs
hotspot.mechanism: The rotated knobs maintain the closed electrical circuit, allowing continuous current flow to lighting fixtures to sustain room illumination.
